name: workstream
title: Workstream
description: Quick switcher for VS Code windows with git status, PR info, and Claude Code integration
author: adamhancock

commands.name: index
commands.title: Switch VS Code Window
commands.subtitle: Workstream
commands.description: Switch between VS Code windows and see git status, PR info, and Claude Code sessions

commands.name: create-worktree
commands.title: Create Worktree
commands.subtitle: Workstream
commands.description: Create a new git worktree with automatic setup and VS Code integration

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
